i1.blurb: Skarner's presence causes crystals to spawn in set locations around the map. While near crystals his team owns, Skarner gains tremendous movement speed, attack speed, and mana regeneration.
description: {{sbc|Crystal Spires:}} '''Skarner's''' presence causes a number of ''Crystal Spires'' to appear at set points on the battlefield, which can be captured by {{tip|champions}} who stand near them for 2 seconds. Once captured, ''Crystal Spires'' are owned until contested and the defending team can stand on the spire to prevent the opposing team from capturing it.

''Crystal Spires'' grant {{g|30}} split among its captors upon being captured, or {{g|15}} if only a single champion participated in its capture, and provide {{tip|sight}} around them for {{fd|1.5}} seconds upon being captured, becoming impossible to recapture for 15 seconds.

{{sbc|Crystal Charge:}} While within range of a ''Crystal Spire'' controlled by his team, or while an enemy is {{tip|stun|stunned}} with {{ai|Fracture|Skarner}} or {{tip|suppression|suppressed}} with {{ai|Impale|Skarner}}, '''Skarner''' gains {{pp|18|70|72|74|76|78|80|82|85|88|91|94|97|100|104|108|112|116|120|formula = 68 + 2 per level up to 7, + 3 per level up to 13, and + 4 per level|color=ms}} {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}}, {{pp|18|key=%|43|48|53|58|63|68|73|80|87|94|101|108|115|124|133|142|151|160|formula = 38 + 5 per level up to 7, + 7 per level up to 13, and + 9 per level|color=as}} {{sti|{{as|'''bonus''' attack speed}}}} and restores {{sti|mana|{{as|2% '''maximum''' mana}}}} every second.
i1.name: Crystal Spires
notes: * ''Crystal Spire'' distribution is as follows:
** {{sbc|Six}} in [[Summoner's Rift]]
*** One beside {{uis|Baron Nashor}} pit
*** One beside {{uis|Dragon}} pit
*** One nearby each {{ui|Red Brambleback}}
*** One nearby each {{ui|Blue Sentinel}}
** {{sbc|Five}} in [[Twisted Treeline]]
*** One within {{uis|Vilemaw}} pit
*** One nearby each {{ui|Golem}}
*** One nearby each {{ui|Giant Wolf}}
** {{sbc|Five}} in [[Howling Abyss]]
*** One in each brush
*** One in each team's base (below each inhibitor)

* The ''Crystal Spires'' near {{ui|Baron Nashor}}, {{ui|Dragon}}, {{ui|Vilemaw}}, and the central brush in [[Howling Abyss]] begin the game as neutral and can only be captured after minions spawn (1:30) and onwards.
** All other spires begin as either allied or enemy (depending on position) but can be captured as soon as the game starts.
* No additional ''Crystal Spires'' are spawned in [[One for All]] or mirrored matches
** Every ally ''Skarner'' will receive the bonuses so long as the ''Crystal Spires'' are in allied control.

q1.blurb: Skarner lashes out with his claws, dealing physical damage to all nearby enemies and charging himself with Crystal Energy for several seconds if a unit is struck. If he casts Crystal Slash again while powered by Crystal Energy, he deals bonus magic damage.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Skarner''' deals {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} to all enemies in range.
If an enemy is hit, subsequent uses of ''Crystal Slash'' within 4 seconds deal {{tip|magic damage|{{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}}}}.
Basic attacks against non-structures reduce ''Crystal Slash's'' {{sti|cooldown}} by {{fd|0.25}} seconds, quadrupled to 1 against enemy champions.
leveling: {{st|Bonus Magic Damage|{{as|{{ap|33 to 45}}% AD}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}|Total Mixed Damage|{{as|{{ap|33*2 to 45*2}}% AD}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}}}
q1.name: Crystal Slash
notes: * ''Crystal Slash'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Skarner's'' previous orders.
* {{tip|Spell shield}} will block the damage but will not prevent ''Skarner'' from triggering the bonus effect.

w1.blurb: Skarner gains a shield and has increased Movement Speed while the shield persists.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Skarner''' {{tip|shields}} himself for up to 6 seconds, gaining initial {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} that accelerates by 100% over 3 seconds while the shield holds.
leveling:
{{st|Shield Strength|{{as|{{ap|10 to 14}}% '''maximum''' health}} {{as|(+ 80% AP)}}}}<!--
-->{{st|Initial Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|8 to 16}}%|Maximum Bonus Movement Speed|{{ap|8*2 to 16*2}}%}}
w1.name: Crystalline Exoskeleton
notes: * ''Crystalline Exoskeleton'' has no cast time and does not interrupt ''Skarner's'' previous orders.

e1.blurb: Skarner summons a blast of crystalline energy which deals damage to enemies struck and slows them. Basic attacking these enemies within a short window will stun them.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Skarner''' launches a blast of energy in the target direction, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies struck and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them for {{fd|2.5}} seconds, as well as marking them with {{ai|Crystal Venom|Skarner}} for 5 seconds. ''Fracture's'' projectile slows down every time it hits an enemy.

'''Skarner's''' next basic attack against a target marked with {{ai|Crystal Venom|Skarner}} consumes the mark to deal them {{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}} and {{tip|stun}} them for {{fd|1.25}} seconds.

Every time he {{tip|stun|stuns}} a target with ''Fracture'' or {{tip|suppression|suppresses}} an enemy with {{ai|Impale|Skarner}}, ''Fracture's'' {{sti|cooldown}} is reduced by the corresponding duration of the disable.
e1.name: Fracture
notes: * '''Fracture''' will be disabled during {{ai|Impale|Skarner}}.

* '''POSSIBLE BUG''': {{ai|Crystal Venom|Skarner}} will be consumed but deal no damage or apply the {{tip|stun}} if {{ci|Skarner}} is {{tip|blind|blinded}} / the attack is {{ai|Counter Strike|Jax|dodged}} or {{ai|Aegis Protection|Pantheon|blocked}}.
** The attack will be blocked and counted as a {{tip|immobilize}} effect for {{cai|Riposte|Fiora}}.

r1.blurb: Skarner suppresses an enemy champion and deals damage to it. During this time, Skarner can move freely and will drag his helpless victim around with him. When the effect ends, the target will be dealt additional damage.
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Skarner''' rears his stinger and brings it down, {{tip|root|rooting}} the target enemy for {{tt|{{fd|0.25}}|Estimated}} seconds, dealing {{as|60% AD}} {{as|physical damage}}, {{as|magic damage}}, and {{tip|suppression|suppressing}} them for {{fd|1.75}} seconds. At the end of the duration, the target takes the same damage again.
For the duration, '''Skarner''' can move freely and drag his victim around with him but cannot attack them.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|20 to 100}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|20*2 to 100*2}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}}|Total Mixed Damage|{{ap|20*2 to 100*2}} {{as|(+ 100% AP)}} {{as|(+ 120% AD)}}}}
r1.name: Impale
notes: * The target will not take ''Impale's'' secondary damage if the suppression is removed ({{nie|Quicksilver}}, {{ai|Remove Scurvy|Gangplank}}).

* ''Impale'' is canceled (but does not go on cooldown) if ''Skarner'' loses sight of his target or if they exceed a range threshold (whether by being mid-dash, removing the root and backing away, or ''Skarner'' being displaced) during the initial {{tt|{{fd|0.25}}|Estimated}} seconds.
* ''Skarner's'' target will follow him around regardless of how they move (walking, dashing, {{ai|Buster Shot|Tristana}}, {{ai|Dark Passage|Thresh}}).

* While ''Impale's'' suppression is active, and for the purposes of direction-conditioned abilities ({{ai|Petrifying Gaze|Cassiopeia}}, {{ai|Mocking Shout|Tryndamere}}) ''Skarner'' is considered to be facing in the direction he is moving and not the one his model is facing.
